title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Interaction-Based Design for Massive Open Online Courses (MOOCs)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three formative assessment strategies utilizing quizzes, peer feedback, and simulations in MOOC environments
Learners perform interactions for solving social problems in VR-based scenarios with 80% accuracy
Learners can design and apply at least once a scalable feedback model minimizing teacher dependency to peers

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
